changePaint

public static void changePaint(android.graphics.Paint paint,
                               int argb)
Changes the paint color to the specified value.

Parameters:
paint - the object to mutate with the new color
argb - a 32-bit integer with eight bits for alpha, red, green, and blue, respectively

changePaintTransparent

Changes the paint color to transparent
